mapper.sql: t.id, t.eqp_id, t.period_date, t.run_time, t.idle_time, t.down_time, t.pm_time, t.other_time, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.update_by, t.update_date, t.del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT period_date periodDate, sum(run_time) runTime, sum(idle_time) idleTime, sum(down_time) downTime, sum(pm_time) pmTime, sum(other_time) otherTime, sum(run_time)+sum(idle_time)+sum(down_time)+sum(pm_time)+sum(other_time) as "totalTime" FROM rpt_eqp_state_day t LEFT JOIN fab_equipment f on t.EQP_ID=f.EQP_ID and f.del_flag=0 and f.active_flag = '1' WHERE t.period_date between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and f.line_no='SIM' group by t.period_date
